website_summaries.verdict: A great value for the price, as the MX Sound features high-end audio with deep bass, the ability to connect 2 Bluetooth devices at once, and extremely simple controls.
pros: Easy to switch between audio sources
Motion-activated and backlit controls on front of speakers
cons: The speakers will automatically fall into standby mode after 20 minutes of “inactivity,” but will instantly wake up if you wave your hand in front of them

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy if you are using a PC without Bluetooth
customer_reviews.text: So this speaker goes to sleep after 20 minutes if you plug the aux cable into PC. From my experience bluetooth is fine without the speaker going to sleep. This is my second time purchasing as the first time i returned to Amazon because I thought the product was defective but after further researching and purchase it turns out the speaker will go to sleep after 20 minutes if connected to cable with PC.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Why standby mode?
customer_reviews.text: The speakers are pretty nice, but they have a standby mode that can't be overridden. They turn off after about 20 minutes and require you to wave your hand in front of them to turn them back on.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great desktop/PC/Bluetooth speakers
customer_reviews.text: Just received these and hooked them up in my office. They are near perfect. They are aesthetically nice for an office environment. They do have Bluetooth, Computer In, and even an Auxiliary port. The sound is actually very impressive. The spatial positioning of the sound was quite surprising as it makes sound appear to come out of nowhere in the space between the speakers (I have them placed about 3 feet apart). A great product for a good price.
customer_reviews.author: Frozen North

customer_reviews.title: Well worth it, the sound is great and the connection is fast and easy. You won't regret the purchase
customer_reviews.text: These are slightly bigger than I thought they would be but the sound is great, I have only had them for a day and I haven't even used my headphones yet because im enjoying them too much. The bluetooth connected instantly so that was great, they have a headphone jack in the back alone with connections for pc/monitor or phone but I like the bluetooth right now. I'm really glad I got these, well worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: G. Boscamp

customer_reviews.title: Sound quality and Design
customer_reviews.text: Perfect desktop speakers and they have a nice modern look to them. It's an ease to set up and use. I am not a big Audio reviewer but these definitely meet my expectations. I mainly use over the ear headphones for true submersion at my desk, but these are perfect for me when I just want to watch a little TV at my desk or have someone esle watch me play some games. 1/24/18 UPDATE: The Left Speaker has gone out completely. Not sure what the issue really is. It's plugged in properly have tried using it on mutiple devices to test. Very disappointed as I haven't had them for a year yet.
customer_reviews.author: Eric Sebastian Rodriguez

customer_reviews.title: Seriously bad. Please don't waste your money. I can't believe these are Logitech.
customer_reviews.text: I love Logitech stuff. Keyboard, mouse, other peripherals... so I thought these would be pretty good. Wrong. These are awful. Total waste of money. I tried to return but forgot before it was too late and now I'm stuck with them. They look cool, sure. But they sound awful. My monitor speakers sound fuller and better. There's not much else to say, really. Spend a few more dollars and get something better. I don't think Logitech should ever have even released these things.
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Turns off Audio from PC even if sound is playing after 15 mins
customer_reviews.text: The speakers have an auto shut off "feature" that happens every 15-20 minutes. If you're watching Netflix, every 15 minutes the speaker turns off and you have to wave your hand in front of the speaker to wake it back up. Only way I've found to fix it is so turn the volume on your PC all the way up and turn the volume for the speaker down. Owned these for over a year and haven't had any issues with them besides the auto shut off nonsense.
customer_reviews.author: BY

customer_reviews.title: Just what I needed for the new 2018 Mac Mini
customer_reviews.text: The Mac Mini's internal speaker is 'tolerable', but after getting such a nice new rig, I wanted some decent sound for my setup. They look super slick, hook up easy, and sound great. As described, the bass is not going to shake your desk, but i'm not using this as my main home soundsystem. I can hear them from all the way across my 3000sqft one-story house, so I recommend these guys, and will update if i find i have issues, but so far, so good. :)
customer_reviews.author: Michael G.

customer_reviews.title: Great, but can be improved
customer_reviews.text: These speakers sound awesome. Whether you are gaming or listening to music I think you will definitely be pleased. I do have the issue of gaming on steam and then the speakers go to sleep. Like why???? So that is one of my gripes about this. I also wish the speakers had more configuration settings. This wouldn't be able to be done on the speakers themselves but through an app, or webapp.
customer_reviews.author: Digital_1mpulse

customer_reviews.title: Great and look good too.
customer_reviews.text: Not too terribly expensive for what you are getting. The sound is pretty decent and they look great on your desk. There is a known software glitch which I don't think Logitech will ever solve but there is a way around it. If the speakers randomly turn off, you turn the volume on your pc up to volume 20 and then adjust the volume on the speakers themselves. Other than that, they are honestly great.
customer_reviews.author: Jaz T

customer_reviews.title: Great Speakers!
customer_reviews.text: I really like these speakers. They are loud, sound great, and look exceptional. I have no complaints about them with the exception of volume control. If your input sound is too quiet, then the speakers will automatically turn off after about 20 minutes. So, the solution around this is to control the volume on the physical speaker and turn up your input volume. I highly suggest this product if you are a creative professional or just want high-end desktop speakers.
customer_reviews.author: Devon

customer_reviews.title: Good speakers that work except...
customer_reviews.text: If these speakers aren't attached to Bluetooth, they go onto Standby after 20 minutes. You have to wave your hand near the speaker to get them to work again. Very annoying. There is no option to disable this, though the Logitech support boards recommend putting your computer volume above 10 because otherwise the speakers assume that your speakers aren't in use. Not that you're not trying to be quiet for your neighbors and the rest of the house.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. West

customer_reviews.title: After 3 Months Use
customer_reviews.text: I am realizing these are more for watching a webinar or quick job-related videos. These are not really meant for music. They will work, especially if you work in close quarters and can’t play loudly. I have an office and listen to music all day. I’m an “audiophile”... if you will. This have weak highs and lack any bass at all. Knowing that, I would not have bought them. However, they do the job. And they do it better than the iHome I speaker I was using before. If your use is for music, for the price, do yourself a favor and look into actual speakers.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent sound and build quality, just a bit big-ish for desktop...
customer_reviews.text: Wish they were slightly smaller, and also that I didn't have to approach my finger to turn them on. They often turn on just by detecting incoming sound (I use the 3mm jack AUX input), but that's unpredictable (sometimes they turn on, sometimes I have to approach my finger to wake them up). Minor complaints, excellent speakers otherwise.
customer_reviews.author: Z. Simic

customer_reviews.title: Small size, big sound, detachable left channel
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these for my traveling speakers. They are just small enough to fit in my weekend getaway backpack but still deliver big sound. I choose this model in particularly because the LEFT speaker detached from the RIGHT speaker and uses a standard phono connection. This allowed me to purchase a 12 foot speaker phono extension so I can put one speaker on each side of the bed in our hotel room. I use my SiriusXM Onyx radio with them and it’s the perfect setup. I haven’t experienced the overwhelming bass that I read about in previous reviews.
customer_reviews.author: J. Mclaughlin

customer_reviews.title: This standby mode is crazy annoying.
customer_reviews.text: Whenever I'm playing video games, the sound cuts off after about 20 mins and I have to wave my hand frantically to get audio back. Logitech seems to be doing nothing about this so I think it's fair to warn anyone else would offer them money until they resolve this issue.
customer_reviews.author: Min Yong Kim

customer_reviews.title: Great sounding speakers with one big issue
customer_reviews.text: I have had these speakers for a few months and have been impressed by the sound quality. They sound much better in smaller rooms. I initially had them in a larger space and I wasn't happy but after going into a smaller room they really do sound great. The biggest issue I have is when using the 3.5mm jack they have really inconsistent audio. You can hear the volume of a song going up and down. I have researched the problem and have found no fix. But if you use bluetooth they have very consistent and great sounding audio. I would recommend these as bluetooth speakers not wired.
customer_reviews.author: Trevor Bullis

customer_reviews.title: These are fantastic
customer_reviews.text: I've not run into the timeout issue that others have, perhaps I don't use them the same way or have them positioned so that if I'm in front of the computer they stay activated. Not sure. But the sound is great, the size is just right, and it connected nicely to both my phone and the computer's bluetooth port. I'm loving them!
customer_reviews.author: Alex Menkes

customer_reviews.title: Muddy sound quality
customer_reviews.text: Sound quality is unimpressive for so large a device. Channels seem muted. No changing of settings in the computer improved this. Bluetooth was the same. Also, mine will come on at full volume randomly. Considering returning these.
customer_reviews.author: Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good Sound, Good Design, Some Connectivity Issues
customer_reviews.text: Great sound quality for the price, but I occasionally experience some connectivity issues, and have to reset the bluetooth connection from scratch. They have a nice, clean design that works well with the modern aesthetic of my room. Although the shell is made from plastic, they do look and feel like a higher quality product. They also come with an AUX cord, in case you find the bluetooth is more trouble than it's worth.
customer_reviews.author: LA.2.NYC

customer_reviews.title: Good once you get used to them
customer_reviews.text: I usually use headphones but wanted a nice clean looking set of speakers for my desk. These fit the bill. The audio profile is a little bass heavy and even muddy at times, but I mostly don't notice it. The double Bluetooth connectivity is awesome for playing audio off my phone in a pinch. They look great and I like how much bass you can get without a separate sub. If you only use speakers some of the time, like a pronounced bass, and value form over function these should fit the bill.
customer_reviews.author: Zaq

customer_reviews.title: Died too soon.
customer_reviews.text: I have had these speakers for five months and they have stopped working. I didn’t keep the packaging due to it being five months and was not expecting them to just stop working. I have trouble shot everything that could possibly be causing the issue, and nothing has helped. They were on the cheap side, but I admit, I was expecting a bit more time out of them.
customer_reviews.author: Susan Emily Reed

customer_reviews.title: Speaker worked well for about 5 months, and then stopped working completely.
customer_reviews.text: I'm writing mostly because I'm wondering if my problem is an isolated issue. I bought this speaker in January, yet recently it has completely stopped working. Speaker will be plugged into power, all cords attached properly, and yet LEDs will not light up, Bluetooth will pair but no sound will come out, just completely dead. Definitely not worth the money if others are experiencing this issue. Tried contacting Logitech support, but with no way to find this product on their website and absurd waiting times for customer support, I recommend you look elsewhere for a quality, reliable speaker with good manufacturing.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: They sound good but are functionally terrible
customer_reviews.text: Honestly I want to like these speakers because they look nice and they sound nice. Sadly they don't function very well. I had one pair where the left speaker just stopped working so I had to get a replacement and the replacement speaker once again has problems with the left one, this time from a constant buzzing noise. Besides that the volume control can be unresponsive and they randomly turn off if you aren't constantly playing loud nose through them, which can be a problem when you're playing a game or watching something and the audio randomly cuts out. I'm sure the speakers are great for playing music through Bluetooth but otherwise I'd say not worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Wevet

customer_reviews.title: Standby Mode ruins the experience
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately, while I like the product's design and minimal amount of cabling, the 20 minute standby mode that many others have also mentioned in the comments is a hassle. Having to crank up the volume or wave your hand over the controls for regular PC usage (via aux/3.5mm) just to wake it up is a hassle.
customer_reviews.author: Srbilyon Harris

customer_reviews.title: Awful bass
customer_reviews.text: I'm really sensitive to bass and there's no way to adjust it. Started getting really bad headaches pretty immediately listening to this. Spotify for PC doesn't have an equalizer so my only option is to have it on the device. Any speakers with Subwoofer should have adjustable bass. Returned it.
customer_reviews.author: Max

customer_reviews.title: Better speakers for less
customer_reviews.text: Seems well put together besides missing a rubber foot piece and set-up was very easy. Sadly the sound quality is subpar for a $80 set of speakers. Cheaper Logitech speakers have the same if not better sound quality. Better than laptop built in speakers but barely.
customer_reviews.author: C. Franco

customer_reviews.title: Great Bluetooth speakers
customer_reviews.text: These speakers are great. The volume gets really lot and clear, bluetooth connect almost instantly and the design is cool. Only issue is the huge jump in volume, it bumps up and down by 8 increments so you might get some surprisingly loud audio when you initially start up your device.
customer_reviews.author: Kong10192

customer_reviews.title: Personal Opinions
customer_reviews.text: Ive used this speaker system for over a year now and they worked fine in the beginning. Currently they have an issue with cutting out every so often which is annoying because I would have to mess with the sound settings on my desktop to get it to respond. Other than that I think the sound quality is decent for the price your paying if your on a medium to low budget. The volume controls are kind of hard to use because it has weird touch sensitivity. Overall I will probably stick with this for a while but not a big fan, you can probably find something better for same pricepoint.
customer_reviews.author: justin chuong

customer_reviews.title: Won't start, even when wired
customer_reviews.text: I have had to disconnect the power and reconnect to get it to work, despite the fact that I used it with an Aux connection. The volume controls are not very easy to quickly use either. They seem to have a mind of their own. They sound pretty good, when you are not distracted by these issues.
customer_reviews.author: PackerBacker

customer_reviews.title: Blew me away
customer_reviews.text: Having to reconnect them sounds like a first world problem and should not be a deal breaker. I haven't had any problems with them so far. The sound is amazing and these things are worth the asking price. Side note: You will probably be surprised by how big they are.
customer_reviews.author: Paul

customer_reviews.title: Clean looking, decent sounding speakers
customer_reviews.text: Well rounded speakers. Sound is boomer than I expected. But it works well for short listening sessions. For about 80 dollars they are a good pair. After 20 min of no input, the speakers go to sleep mode, just a wave of a hand will wake the speakers. They are tidy looking speakers. When paired with other mx series products (I have MX keys keyboard and MX anywhere mouse) the speakers give a cleaner desktop look. Happy with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Prasad K

customer_reviews.title: Decent sound, fantastic look...
customer_reviews.text: I’ll be honest here: I got these because they martched my Logitech MX series keyboard and mouse. That said, I wasn’t looking or expecting big sound. That said, these are still plenty adequate for a basic desktop 2.0 sound setup. The Bluetooth capability is a great bonus.
customer_reviews.author: Steve

customer_reviews.title: Totally worth it
customer_reviews.text: Speakers look great. Speaker sound great. Speakers are great. Honestly - bang for the buck is good and the built in bass is a nice touch - no huge box sitting on the floor under my desk anymore...bluetooth works just fine - my CPU and phone both recognized the device right away. Buy with confidence if these will suit your needs.
customer_reviews.author: Breaktop22

customer_reviews.title: Value Speaker
customer_reviews.text: I love this speaker, I am not a big fan of premium sound quality speaker but this speaker does impress me with its sound quality. Should be five star but one star off because of the auto shut off issue, but problem solve after connect it to the Bluetooth.
customer_reviews.author: JZ

customer_reviews.title: looks nice that is about it
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product after doing research. People said good things about it. It was an easy setup, plug and play basically. It worked fine for the first 2 weeks, after that the sound quality started degrading. Now the sound is mostly distorted.
customer_reviews.author: d.s

customer_reviews.title: You Cannot Find Any Better Desktop Speakers.
customer_reviews.text: Great Quality built, Great features, More than adequate sound quality for being a pair of desktop speakers. I connect with my Mac via Bluetooth and works effortlessly. I even noticed some surrounding sounds popping in every now and then. Pretty awesome!
customer_reviews.author: Sorit

customer_reviews.title: Futuristic and easy set up
customer_reviews.text: I love these speakers. The bass isn't the best but since I have downstairs neighbors it's not a bother since I can play music loud and not worry about disturbing them downstairs. The bluetooth set up is super easy and they're great computer speakers. I don't have the bluetooth issue that others are complaining about with the speakers either.
customer_reviews.author: Mattea Guldy

customer_reviews.title: Bass is lacking but they look great!
customer_reviews.text: I wouldn't say the sound is bad, it just needs a little more bass to really stand out. Otherwise they look really cool and the volume up/down feature is neat!
customer_reviews.author: Justin

customer_reviews.title: 20 Min shutoff is stupid and cant be disabled
customer_reviews.text: 20 Min shutoff is stupid and cant be disabled its beyond annoying.
customer_reviews.author: Jim

customer_reviews.title: Nice speakers
customer_reviews.text: I needed a pair of whatever speakers and this set was on sale for Prime Day. Build quality is good and everything is working as expected. Sound is way better than expected and the external volume control syncs up with the computer volume control Only negative I can think of is that if your fingers are dirty and try to adjust the volume from the speakers well, you'll probably stain it. Overall I'm more than happy with these speakers.
customer_reviews.author: Nik

customer_reviews.title: The speakers go into stand by after 20 minutes whether you are using them or not.
customer_reviews.text: There is no way to disable them from going into stand by.
customer_reviews.author: Sean

customer_reviews.title: Compliment my MacBook Pro setup
customer_reviews.text: These speakers sound and works great when using in conjunction with EQ software on my MacBook. I do experience some connectivity issues (like who hasn't with bluetooth) however not enough to make me return the item.
customer_reviews.author: Lenjai

customer_reviews.title: Nice sound and auxiliary port
customer_reviews.text: Set this up for a small flat screen in the kitchen for my elderly parents that had trouble hearing the TV. significant sound improvement for them. I also booked up a Chromecast audio to it so they can listen to music in the kitchen while cooking. Slightly on the larger size for a small counter area but worth it for the sound quality.
customer_reviews.author: Dmo

customer_reviews.title: Looks great, sounds meh
customer_reviews.text: These looked great on my desk but that was I a best feature. These speakers sound average for the price with no real base at all. If you are looking for a great sounding speaker than I would look at Creative for the price range. In my case I returned these speakers and picked up the logitech z623 for a few more bucks Which I believe offers 10x more value for the price. Although they do not look as nice and modern.
customer_reviews.author: christian marini

customer_reviews.title: Good for the price
customer_reviews.text: For what you pay they sounds good, but they doesn’t sound as clear as I was expecting. While listening to music the “bass” affect the sound clarity something that doesn’t happen with my iMac speakers but those are at another level. The multi device connections works great.
customer_reviews.author: M&A Shopping

customer_reviews.title: They just stopped working
customer_reviews.text: After five months they just stopped working. The sound always went in and out. You have to wave your hand in front to get it going again but to just stop working. I am flabbergasted and disgusted with Logitech. That will be the last of my money they get. Keep shopping.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher Williams

customer_reviews.title: Great Speakers
customer_reviews.text: Great pair of speakers. There is a wire that connects them together, but I can definitely overlook it. However, it might not be for everyone’s budget.
customer_reviews.author: Cristian

customer_reviews.title: Like these a bunch
customer_reviews.text: great add to my MacPro tower, small footprint but excellent sound and controls are reasonably intuitive. Would def buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Douglas F. Marks

customer_reviews.title: Instant noticeable upgrade. One Small problem however ...
customer_reviews.text: Great sound and build quality, easy to set up as well. However if you have it on low volume like 18% and below, it might automatically go to sleep.
customer_reviews.author: Leon Vuong

customer_reviews.title: Nice Speaker - Standby mode is the worst
customer_reviews.text: The speaker looks and sounds great. If you use the AUX cable the speaker goes into standby mode. Very annoying, you have to wave your hand in front of it to turn it back on.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Robinson

customer_reviews.title: Connector Cord is two short for good separation
customer_reviews.text: The speakers work well but they would be much better if the cord between the tow was longer so they could be separated farther apart.
customer_reviews.author: Randal (Randy) D. Wilson

customer_reviews.title: BIG BANG FOR THE BUCK
customer_reviews.text: Got these to use for my laptop sound as i promarily work at a desk and they are a huge improvement over the laptop speakers. A lot of sound for a little bit of money, no its not yhe best quality and there isnt a sub, but for the price I would challenge anyone to find better.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher Facendola

customer_reviews.title: Connect two devices at the same time!
customer_reviews.text: The sound quality is great but what is amazing is that you can connect to two separate devices at the same time!! My Echo Dot is connected through Bluetooth and PC through Jack. They can SIMULTANEOUSLY work, where I can play music with Alexa and play games/videos with PC.
customer_reviews.author: Kaan

customer_reviews.title: Great computer speakers
customer_reviews.text: These are great. I was concerned about the 20 minute timeout but have not found it to be a problem. When my wired audio begins playing from the computer they seem to auto-wake. I have not tried using via Bluetooth yet. The sound quality is really good, and they're attractive and compact. Recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Mitchell

customer_reviews.title: Definitely a premium speakers.
customer_reviews.text: Excellent speakers, good range, great for gaming, good for music, excellent design, easy controls.
customer_reviews.author: ARdz

customer_reviews.title: Solid
customer_reviews.text: Arrived damaged with dents on side of speaker. The sound quality is great though.. nothing mind blowing but solid for the price
customer_reviews.author: Josh S

customer_reviews.title: Great speakers, minimalist design
customer_reviews.text: Look good, sound great, Bluetooth works as advertised, no regrets getting these speakers.
customer_reviews.author: KRISP

customer_reviews.title: Great Value. Big Speakers
customer_reviews.text: A lot bigger than I expected for some reason, each speaker is about the size of my hand, but they sound great, feel great, and were simple to get set up. I haven't tried out the Bluetooth side of things but I'm using them plug and play with no issues through the aux cord on my pc. I've also used my headset through the included headphone jack which is also a nice touch.
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Sounds great!
customer_reviews.text: Works well in my office and stays connected. The sound from these speakers are great!
customer_reviews.author: JAboc

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price
customer_reviews.text: Got them for half price during prime day. Very easy to connect to my pc using audio cable and phone using Bluetooth. Sound is great too
customer_reviews.author: djairo

customer_reviews.title: Bigger than expected, but also bigger sound than expected!
customer_reviews.text: They look great, sound great, motion detection works well, just be prepared for their size, they're much bigger than they look in the pictures, so probably not the best if you're looking for the most compact solution possible, but they sound much bigger than they are. Definitely one of the best values for the money out there as far as sound quality.
customer_reviews.author: B. Schwab

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY GARBAGE
customer_reviews.text: Constant issue with volume lowers itself, after computer wakes up from sleep. Customer support is NON EXISTANT.
customer_reviews.author: pb

customer_reviews.title: That standby mode is ridiculous
customer_reviews.text: Trying to use the AUX connection is a nonstarter; sound cuts out seemingly at random. Worst part is that the output for it to shut off is lower than it is for it turn back on, so you always have to fiddle with the source volume to wake it up.. What a bizarre "feature" to apply to a constant connection.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: stopped working after 6 months
customer_reviews.text: this product sucks. It stopped working after 6 months, does not turn on.
customer_reviews.author: vladimir gertsik

customer_reviews.title: Best bluetooth speakers
customer_reviews.text: These are some powerful bluetooth speakers and replaced my previous desktop wired speakers. Amazing value for the sounds. Can be paired with your desktop or phone. Highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Coca

customer_reviews.title: Works fantastic with my desktop
customer_reviews.text: Holy cow!! These speakers are powerful for what they are. Works fantastic with my desktop.
customer_reviews.author: Brandon

customer_reviews.title: Look cool and small
customer_reviews.text: Litttle interference from things around it but small and sound good.
customer_reviews.author: jessica

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: Love these speakers! They work well and the audio sounds good. No complaints.
customer_reviews.author: J

customer_reviews.title: Effing amazong!
customer_reviews.text: Grabbed these for $75, amazing sound bass treble and clarity. Would love a software interface but regardless they sound great and are quality in every aspect. Definitely recommend connecting to your PC via analog and everything else blue tooth
customer_reviews.author: Kevin C.

customer_reviews.title: Absolute waste of money
customer_reviews.text: Although the Bluetooth connectivity is convenient, the sound quality is one of the worst I experienced. If Bluetooth connectivity isn’t absolute must for you, skip this product and get yourself better speakers for half the price.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Abeles

customer_reviews.title: Longetivity of the product
customer_reviews.text: it only less than six months it has started to give problem it will not turn on when i start my computer ( desktop)
customer_reviews.author: German Sheperd

customer_reviews.title: Great computer speaker
customer_reviews.text: Great buy. Larger in size than what I expected. But overall great. I use it as a blue tooth speaker to my Mac, so far had no connectivity issue.
customer_reviews.author: shabab

customer_reviews.title: Very Cool looking!
customer_reviews.text: Great sound and look fantastic! Perfect for home or work usage.
customer_reviews.author: Ana Rosario

customer_reviews.title: Great stylish Bluetooth speakers!
customer_reviews.text: These are great speakers and pair very easily with all my Bluetooth devices’ as I’m sure you can tell...I really like these speakers!
customer_reviews.author: glenn walker

customer_reviews.title: Logi
customer_reviews.text: Great purchase..I really like the Bluetooth option, as well as the controls light up when you put your hands close.
customer_reviews.author: Burgess

customer_reviews.title: It's a very disappointing product.
customer_reviews.text: It's a very disappointing product. The sound is connected by Aux line, and even Windows 10's basic environmental sound is broken. Not recommended for absolute price. I feel like I left my money in the trash.
customer_reviews.author: younghun j.

customer_reviews.title: Value for money
customer_reviews.text: Bought these speakers on sale ($50 because of Black Friday) and I gotta say it was absolutely worth it. The lack of a subwoofer is compensated by excellent sound quality, deep bass, and overall great build quality. I 100% recommend getting the Logitech MX Sound 2.0 if you're looking for something on the $75-150 range.
customer_reviews.author: Nacho Menéndez

customer_reviews.title: Great sound
customer_reviews.text: I love these. These sound great. I bought for half price during Black Friday week. Totally worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Timothy H.

customer_reviews.title: Very good audio for my small "entertainment center"
customer_reviews.text: Very good audio for my small "entertainment center", and I could finally get rid of my multiple audio mux and connect all of them with bluetooth.
customer_reviews.author: Jianyu Chen

customer_reviews.title: Song with beats have problem
customer_reviews.text: The speaker is good, but whatever song have beats on them the volume of the the singer get low and rise when the beats stop I don't know if there is a problem with my speaker or what.
customer_reviews.author: kassim m.

customer_reviews.title: Not a lot of base, but still really loud.
